meta.name: Generate AI sales proposals using Anthropic Claude, PDF Noodle and your CRM

parameters.text:
=Here's the information about the customer I want you to use to generate the expected output:
{{ $json.available_data }}

options.systemMessage:
=You are a sales proposal assistant. Your job is to analyze meeting transcripts and extract structured data for generating professional proposals.

## INPUT

You will receive:

1. A meeting transcript or notes
2. Client information (company name, contact details)
3. The proposal template schema

## YOUR TASK

Extract and structure the following information from the transcript:

1. **Client Challenges** (array)
    - Title: Short name for the challenge
    - Description: 1-2 sentences explaining the problem
    - Impact: Business impact if not solved
2. **Proposed Solutions** (array)
    - Title: Solution name
    - Description: How it solves the challenge
    - Outcome: Expected result
    - Timeline: Implementation time
3. **Pricing** (array)
    - Item: What's being charged
    - Description: One-time or recurring
    - Price: Dollar amount
4. **Executive Summary**: 2-3 sentences summarizing the proposal
5. **Next Steps** (array): Actionable items to move forward

## OUTPUT FORMAT

Return ONLY valid JSON matching this schema. No markdown, no explanation, just JSON.

{ ... insert your variable schema here }


## RULES

- If information is missing, make reasonable assumptions based on context
- Keep language professional but conversational
- Format prices consistently ($X,XXX)
- Limit challenges and solutions to 3 items max
- Be specific with outcomes (use numbers when possible)

parameters.message:
=Hey {{ $('Fields Mapping').first().json.name.split(" ")[0] }},

Great chatting with you earlier! I was excited enough about what we discussed that I went ahead and put a proposal together right away.

I've attached it as a PDF. Take a look when it works for you and let me know if anything needs adjusting.

I've also sent an invoice your way so everything's ready to go whenever you are. Feel free to reach out with any questions at all.

Looking forward to it!
[YOUR NAME]
parameters.subject: =[Your Company] Proposal for {{ $('Fields Mapping').first().json.company }}

parameters.content:
## Welcome to Generate Custom Proposal with AI Workflow!

**This workflow has the following sequence:**
1. Webhook trigger (connected to your CRM)
2. Map all the fields we're going to need on the workflow
3. Transforming customer data and transcription into a formatted output
4. Transform it into a custom PDF proposal using pdf noodle
5. Sending the proposal through e-mail (You can change this nome to send using other formats as well)


**The following accesses are required for the workflow:**
- pdf noodle account: [Create here](https://app.pdfnoodle.com/auth/sign-up)
- AI API access (e.g. via OpenAI, Anthropic, Google or Ollama)
- Google OAuth2 Connected (with gmail permission): [Documentation](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/google/oauth-generic/)


You can contact me via LinkedIn, if you have any questions: https://www.linkedin.com/in/marceloamiranda
### 1. Receiving and mapping data from CRM
### 2. AI Agents formatting the data into the expected format for the PDF generation
### 3. Generating and downloading the PDF of the proposal
### 4. Sending an e-mail to the prospect with the PDF Proposal attached to it

Webhook.meetingTranscript: Had a discovery call with Sarah from Acme Corp today. They're currently processing about 500 invoices per month manually, which takes their AP team around 40 hours per week. Main pain points: 1) Manual data entry errors causing payment delays, 2) No visibility into invoice status, 3) Difficulty scaling with growth. They're interested in our invoice automation solution. Discussed our standard package at $3,000 setup + $800/month. Sarah wants to loop in their CFO for the next call. Mentioned they'd like to go live within 30 days. Budget seems approved, just need final sign-off.
